Title: Senior Data Analyst
Description:
About Satispay

Satispay was born to revolutionise everyday payments ‚Äì making them simple, fair, and accessible to everyone. Now, the focus has moved even further, aiming to shape the future of money.

We're a movement empowering millions of people, driven by a shared purpose to tackle big challenges. And we're just getting started. We move quickly, think boldly, and trust each other to challenge the norm, learning and growing as we go.

If you're looking for more than just your next job ‚Äì if you want to build something impactful with a talented team ‚Äì you're in the right place.

What You'll Be Doing

As a Senior Data Analyst, you'll play a key role in enhancing data-driven decision-making and uncovering analytics opportunities for growth within the Growth team and across business lines. Here's what your day-to-day will look like:


Deliver data-driven impact ‚Äì By analyzing and implementing rigorous data-driven solutions that bring concrete value to the Growth team and other business lines, directly influencing strategic decisions and outcomes.
Analyze large datasets ‚Äì To interpret complex information within large datasets, derive actionable insights, and support key decision-making processes across various departments through clear and concise analysis.
Design and manage experiments ‚Äì By developing and overseeing A/B tests and other experiments to optimize product features and business processes, ensuring statistically significant results and providing clear recommendations.
Create data visualizations ‚Äì To track key performance indicators (KPIs) and effectively communicate complex analytical insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders through intuitive dashboards and comprehensive reports.
Collaborate and integrate data ‚Äì By working closely with cross-functional teams (Product Marketing, CRM, Business Development, Engineering) to embed data insights into broader business strategies, ensuring data informs and shapes key initiatives.


Expect challenges, collaboration, and the freedom to bring your ideas to life. Things change quickly here, so be ready to adapt, take initiative, and shape your role as we grow.

Who We're Looking For

We need a problem-solver who loves teamwork and gets things done. If you're curious and ready for real ownership, you'll fit in! Does this sound like you?


Experience & Analytics ‚Äì 5+ years of experience in Business Intelligence or Data Analytics roles, with a strong foundation in analytical, statistical, and quantitative problem-solving skills applied to real-world business challenges.
Programming Expertise ‚Äì Advanced knowledge of SQL, including query optimization techniques for efficient data manipulation and retrieval from large databases, and extensive knowledge of Python or R for statistical modeling and advanced data analysis.
Visualization Tools ‚Äì Proven experience with data visualization technologies such as Looker and Tableau (or similar tools), with the ability to create compelling and insightful dashboards and reports for diverse audiences.
Communication & Detail ‚Äì Strong attention to detail in data analysis and reporting, coupled with the ability to communicate complex analytical insights effectively and convincingly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Language proficiency ‚Äì Fluency in both Italian and English, enabling seamless communication within our international team and with stakeholders across different locations.


Don't worry if you don't tick every box. We believe in the power of different viewpoints and strengths. Your unique perspective is important as we build something special. If you're passionate and can make a difference, we truly encourage you to apply.

Our Benefits & Perks

We believe high commitment, effort, and impact deserve to be highly rewarded and supported. That‚Äôs why we created Satispay CareAbout, our way of making sure you‚Äôre supported in your well-being, growth, and finances:

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß CareAbout health & well-being


Unlimited paid time off
Psychological support & mental health webinars with Serenis
Flexible hybrid working system
Extended parental leave
Childcare leave


üìö CareAbout growth & development


Professional development programmes
Internal mobility program
Language classes with Preply
Internal workshops & training


üí∞ CareAbout financial support


Stock Option Plan (with additional grants often provided based on performance)
International relocation support
Competitive salary
Flexible Benefit budget
Meal vouchers


Equal-Opportunity Employer

At Satispay, we're proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and inclusion, welcoming individuals of all backgrounds. This opportunity is open to everyone, regardless - for instance - of race, colour, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, and national origin. Join us in a workplace where everyone belongs!

Learn More About Us

Curious if our way of working clicks with yours? Our values and pillars aren‚Äôt just fancy words on a page - they really shape everything we do. Explore them here.

Sounds like your kind of place? Awesome!

We‚Äôd love to hear your story.

Title: Data Analyst Intern
Description:
ABOUT US:




Our company:

Founded in 1981, TCL Electronics (HKSE 01070), is a leading global tech brand in display panels, TVs, home comfort and mobile devices. TCL operates its manufacturing and R&D centers worldwide and has products and services in 160 + countries.




TCL Electronics has developed specific expertise, promoting vertical integration, i.e. manufacturing of its LEDTVs from A to Z.

We are official partner of Italian National Football Team.

TCL‚Äôs slogan or signature, ¬´ The Creative Life ¬ª, sets the tone.




For more information, kindly visit our website.




The Role:




TCT Mobile Italy is looking for a Data Analyst Intern to support the Company with the following

duties:

‚Ä¢ Data Collection, gather sales-related data from multiple retailer and other databases;

‚Ä¢ Data owner for the business Activity ledger for promo sellout and incentives;

‚Ä¢ Periodical sales report and Database management;

‚Ä¢ Sales Strategy Support: collaborate with sales teams and leadership to provide data-driven insights and recommendations for optimizing sales strategies, pricing strategies, product offerings, and market positioning;

‚Ä¢ Market insight analysis: stay updated on industry trends, competition benchmark, best

practices related to sales analytics.




Requirements:




¬∑ Bachelor Degree or Master Degree in Economics, Finance or related fields of study;

¬∑ Good knowledge of English Language;

. Good teamwork spirit;

. Excellent knowledge in Excel and strong affinity with mats and figures.

. Proactivity and problem solving capability is requested







Does it sound like you? Then send us your resume and we will be glad to speak to you!







This announcement is aimed at both sexes, pursuant to laws 903/77 and 125/91 and to people of

all ages and all nationalities, pursuant to legislative decrees 215/03 and 216/03.

¬∑ Bachelor Degree or Master Degree in Economics, Finance or related fields of study;

Title: Data Analyst Marketing and Growth - Italy
Description:
If you‚Äôre here, it‚Äôs because you‚Äôre looking for an exciting ride.

A ride that will fuel up your ambitions to take on a new challenge and stretch yourself beyond your comfort zone.

We‚Äôll deliver a non-vanilla culture built on talent, where we work to amplify the impact on millions of people, paving the way forward together.

Not your usual app. We are the fastest-growing multi-category app connecting millions of users with businesses, and couriers, offering on-demand services from more than 170,000 local restaurants, grocers and supermarkets, and high street retail stores. We operate in more than 1500 cities across 23 countries.

Together we revolutionise the way people connect with their everyday needs, from delivering essentials to connecting our ecosystem of users through innovative solutions powered by technology. For us, every day is filled with purpose.

What makes our ride unique?

ü§ù Our culture and strong values.

üí™ Our career development philosophy.

ü§ù Our commitment to being a force for good.

We have a vision: To give everyone easy access to anything in their cities. And this is where your ride starts.

YOUR MISSION


Understand business needs and create insightful analysis helping your team to make the right decisions to boost Glovo presence and orders
Identify growth opportunities to increase our user base focusing on traffic, conversion and retention rates and leveraging on levers such as pricing, promotions, events, CRM and other marketing levers etc
Drive projects end-to-end translating business challenges into insights and actions
Identify growth opportunities to increase our user base, step change retention rates and maximize profitability
Take ownership of the reporting of KPIs by creating customized tools and using the available ones
Ensure these tools are scalable and up-to-date
Assist your colleagues in gaining access to the right data, and communicate and simplify concepts to the audience's needs
Drive clarity and solve ambiguity using data-driven approaches
Apply your expertise in quantitative analysis, data mining, and the presentation of data to see beyond the numbers and understand how our users interact with both our consumer and business products, identify growth opportunities, and execute projects to drive growth and engagement


What You Will Bring To The Ride


1-3 years of work experience on analytical roles leading analysis and turning insights into actions
Bachelor's degree in Math, Engineering, Business, Stats, Quantitative field or Business
SQL proficiency is mandatory / Python is a plus
Ninja expertise with Excel / Google Sheets is a must
Knowledge of visualization tools like Tableau and Looker
Business acumen and passion for end-to-end project management (from ideation and analysis into implementation)
A hands-on attitude is a must. You‚Äôll have to roll up your sleeves!
Proficiency in English
Strong consumer understanding skills


Individuals representing diverse profiles, and abilities, encompassing various genders, ethnicities, and backgrounds, are less likely to apply for this role if they do not possess solid experience in 100% of these areas. Even if it seems you don't meet our musts don't let it stop you, we are all about finding the best talent out there! Skills can be learned, and embracing diversity is invaluable.

We Believe Driven Talent Deserves


üí™ Top-notch private health insurance to keep you at your peak.
üçî Monthly Glovo credit to satisfy your cravings!
üèñÔ∏è Extra time off, the freedom to work from home two days a week, and the opportunity to work from anywhere for up to three weeks a year!
üë™ Enhanced parental leave.
üß† Online therapy and wellbeing benefits to ensure your mental well-being.


Here at Glovo, we thrive on diversity, we believe it enhances our teams, products, and culture. We know that the best ideas come from a mashup of brilliant diverse minds. This is why we are committed to providing equal opportunities to talent from all backgrounds - all genders, racial/diverse backgrounds, abilities, ages, sexual orientations and all other unique characteristics that make you YOU. We will encourage you to bring your authentic self to work, fostering an inclusive environment where everyone feels heard.

Feel free to note your pronouns in your application (e.g., she/her/hers, he/him/his, they/them/theirs, etc).

So, ready to take the wheel and make this the ride of your life?

Delve into our culture by taking a peek at our Instagram and check out our Linkedin and website!

Title: Data & AI Analyst
HTML:
Perch√© assistere al cambiamento, quando puoi guidarlo? In Accenture, potrai crescere in un ambiente inclusivo e rispettoso della tua unicit√† e dei tuoi valori, sviluppando le tue abilit√† con programmi di training continuativi ed esperienziali. Scopri cosa significa lavorare al cuore del cambiamento e accompagna le aziende pi√π importanti nel loro percorso di trasformazione digitale.

Il tuo ruolo e le tue prospettive

Entra a far parte del nostro network internazionale di talenti della consulenza in ambito Strategy & Consulting - Data & AI. Lavorerai con tecnologie innovative su progetti entusiasmanti, aiutando le aziende leader a livello mondiale a sviluppare le loro strategie IT. In particolare, potrai:


  • Partecipare a progetti di Data Strategy & Data Architecture per definire le migliori strategie per permettere ai clienti di raggiungere gli obiettivi di business, attraverso l'implementazione di soluzioni in ambito Data-IT;
  • Prendere parte a progetti in ambito Data Governance e Data Management, dall'analisi e dalla raccolta di requisiti fino al design strategico della soluzione, avendo cura di tutti gli aspetti di qualit√†, fruibilit√†, integrazione e presentazione dei dati;
  • Sviluppare soluzioni di Business Intelligence e Visual Analitycs che permettano una visualizzazione dei dati chiara, significativa ed efficace;
  • Contribuire al disegno di soluzioni in ambito Advanced Analytics, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence e Generative AI per lo sviluppo e l‚Äôimplementazione di modelli di analisi avanzate;
  • Lavorare con tecnologie innovative in ambito Intelligenza Artificiale, per aiutare le aziende leader a livello mondiale a sviluppare strategie IT attraverso un utilizzo consapevole dell'AI.


    • Se vuoi fare della tua passione una carriera e hai le seguenti caratteristiche, ti stiamo aspettando:


  • Percorso di studi in: Ingegneria, Informatica, Fisica, Matematica, e altri corsi legati al mondo dati;
  • Hai una forte passione per i dati e vuoi apprfondire tematiche di Big Data, Artificial Intelligence e Data Visualization skills;
  • Capacit√† di comunicare in modo efficace;
  • Parli e scrivi fluentemente in inglese;
  • Sei un team player e ti senti stimolato dall'interazione con gli altri.

Per informazioni sulla nostra protezione della privacy art13 L.679/2016 (GDPR) vai su‚ÄØhttps://www.accenture.com/it-it/careers/privacy-policy

    Accenture garantisce le pari opportunit√†.

    About Accenture

    Accenture √® una societ√† leader a livello mondiale nel settore dei servizi professionali che aiuta aziende, governi e organizzazioni a costruire il loro nucleo digitale, ottimizzare le operazioni, accelerare la crescita dei ricavi e migliorare i servizi ai cittadini, creando valore tangibile rapidamente e su larga scala. Siamo un'azienda guidata dal talento e dall'innovazione, con circa 799.000 persone che servono clienti in oltre 120 Paesi. La tecnologia √® al centro del cambiamento e siamo tra i leader mondiali in grado di contribuire a guidarlo, anche attraverso solide relazioni con l'ecosistema. Combiniamo una profonda conoscenza tecnologica e leadership nel Cloud, nei dati e nell‚ÄôIntelligenza Artificiale con un'esperienza senza pari nei principali settori industriali, una competenza funzionale e un‚Äôofferta di servizi su scala mondiale. La nostra ampia gamma di servizi, soluzioni e risorse nei settori Strategy & Consulting, Technology, Operations, Industry X e Accenture Song, insieme ad una cultura fondata sul concetto di successo condiviso e ad un impegno a creare valore a 360¬∞, ci permette di aiutare i clienti a reinventarsi e costruire relazioni solide e durature. Misuriamo il nostro successo in base al valore che creiamo, in ottica di reciproca collaborazione, per i clienti, gli azionisti, i partner e le comunit√† in cui operiamo.

Title: Analyst
Description:
Job Description

Are you an Automotive fan and you have a passion for data analysis? Do you enjoy collecting and analyzing data to detect improvements, and in this way support dealers to reach growth opportunities? Would you like to be part of a renowned Automotive company, applying your professional skills and gain experience? Then we might be looking for you!

Purpose Of The Position

The main purpose of the Data Analyst is:


support the parts sales team and Parts Managers
collect, collate and analyse various internal and external composite data
identify and prioritise parts sales growth opportunities at National & Dealer levels.


Duties


Identification and collation of key data from both internal and external sources
Analysis of data, identifying key opportunities for parts sales growth at both National and Dealer levels.
Collect and provide market intelligence and analysis to assist formulation of current and future parts sales marketing strategy
Ongoing analysis and reporting from all programme channels and activities
Focus at all times to achieve nationally set KPI and ‚Ç¨‚Äôs growth objectives
Assist in the building of MSX programme tools, ensuring ongoing correct usage and fit for purpose
Direct communications link between programme activity and client management
Attend and contribute to regular programme meetings
Ensure effective communication and feedback with all parts (MSXI ‚Äì MSX Italy team ‚Äì BMW)
Ensure timely and accurate reporting as per programme requirements
Attend other meetings as required, providing results, feedback and market intelligence


Responsability

People:


Cooperate and collaborate (Team working and team building)
Training for new analyst (training on the job)
Inform the Sales Reps, Parts Manager, Project Coordinator and Project Manager about the critical situations


Finance: none

Asset & Tools

Take care of the company assets (usage in line with company policies, managing and maintenance)

Process


Correct and professional implementation of the project
Apply system management procedures
Propose project improvements (new implementation tools and activities, training material, etc.)


Customer


Provide a good level of job
Cooperate with BMW
Inform Parts Managers, Project Coordinator, PM and BMW on achievements or concerns within ongoing activities


Authorities: None

Knowledge, Skills And Competencies Required


Interpersonal skills
Initiative
Results orientation
Flexibility
Planning and organizing
High adaptability
Time Pressures & Changing priorities
Analytic approach
Team working ability
Proactive approach -
High level of literacy and numeracy -
High level of computer literacy, especially MS Excel and MS Access
Ability to design and deliver Microsoft Word and PowerPoint Presentations


Qualifications


Degree in engineering, economics, business administration or statistic.


Experience:


Previous experiences in the same role are appreciated.


Languages:


Italian native English fluent


Additional Information

MSX is an equal opportunities employer and positively encourages applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of sex, race, disability, age, sexual orientation, gender reassignment, religion or belief, marital status, or pregnancy or maternity. As users of the disability confident scheme, we guarantee to interview all disabled applicants who meet the minimum criteria for the vacancy.

Title: Business Intelligence Specialist
Description:
Join FrieslandCampina as a Business Intelligence Specialist ‚Äì Agrate Office

At FrieslandCampina, we‚Äôre more than a global dairy company ‚Äî we‚Äôre a purpose-driven organization committed to nourishing the world with high-quality, nutritious products. With over 18,000 employees across 100+ countries, we are united by a passion for innovation, sustainability, and excellence.

We‚Äôre currently looking for a Business Intelligence Specialist to join our team in Agrate. If you're passionate about turning data into actionable insights that make a real impact across departments, this is your opportunity to be a strategic partner in a business that values smart decisions and data-led growth.

What We Ask

What You Bring

To succeed in this role, you‚Äôll bring both technical depth and business acumen. We‚Äôre looking for someone who has:


A Master‚Äôs degree in Applied Sciences, Economics, Statistics, or a related field.
Three to Five years of proven experience in a Business Intelligence or Data Analytics role.
Advanced Excel skills and hands-on experience with SQL and Python.
Expertise in building and maintaining data models.
Strong communication skills in English ‚Äî able to simplify complex data for various stakeholders.
A proactive, detail-oriented mindset and a collaborative approach to problem-solving.



What We Offer

We believe in supporting our people to do their best work. Here‚Äôs what you can expect:


A competitive salary based on your experience and skills .
A hybrid working model that supports work-life balance.
Lunch vouchers and practical benefits that make a difference in your day-to-day.
Access to in-house training and continuous learning opportunities.
A collaborative, inclusive culture rooted in respect, diversity, and sustainability.



Vacancy Description

In this dynamic role, you‚Äôll collaborate closely with teams across Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain, and Finance, using your expertise to transform complex datasets into clear, decision-driving insights.

You will:


Collect, clean, and analyze data from multiple sources to identify trends and opportunities.
Build intuitive dashboards and visualizations using tools like Power BI or Tableau.
Design and maintain data models that support strategic planning and operational excellence.
Provide actionable recommendations that guide business decisions across the organization.
Champion data quality, governance, and standardization across systems and teams.
Stay ahead of the curve by identifying new BI tools, trends, and best practices.



Staying true to who you really are, that is your starting point at FrieslandCampina. Because it is precisely by embracing our differences that we can grow together. We want to create a working environment that allows all employees to bring their best and authentic selves. If who we are suits you, but you're not sure if you're the best fit for the role, we still encourage you to apply so we can help you find the role that fits you best.

Team Details

Why FrieslandCampina?

FrieslandCampina is a unique employer ‚Äî our farmer-owned cooperative model empowers us to prioritize people, planet, and profit equally. We foster a culture of equality and inclusion, where every voice matters and every individual can thrive. We are constantly evolving, embracing innovation, and working toward a sustainable future ‚Äî together.

At FrieslandCampina, we‚Äôre more than a global dairy company ‚Äî we‚Äôre a purpose-driven organization committed to nourishing the world with high-quality, nutritious products. With over 18,000 employees across 100+ countries, we are united by a passion for innovation, sustainability, and excellence.

We‚Äôre currently looking for a Business Intelligence Specialist to join our team in Agrate. If you're passionate about turning data into actionable insights that make a real impact across departments, this is your opportunity to be a strategic partner in a business that values smart decisions and data-led growth.

What We Ask

What You Bring

To succeed in this role, you‚Äôll bring both technical depth and business acumen. We‚Äôre looking for someone who has:

  • A Master‚Äôs degree in Applied Sciences, Economics, Statistics, or a related field.
  • Three to Five years of proven experience in a Business Intelligence or Data Analytics role.
  • Advanced Excel skills and hands-on experience with SQL and Python.
  • Expertise in building and maintaining data models.
  • Strong communication skills in English ‚Äî able to simplify complex data for various stakeholders.
  • A proactive, detail-oriented mindset and a collaborative approach to problem-solving.


What We Offer

We believe in supporting our people to do their best work. Here‚Äôs what you can expect:

  • A competitive salary based on your experience and skills .
  • A hybrid working model that supports work-life balance.
  • Lunch vouchers and practical benefits that make a difference in your day-to-day.
  • Access to in-house training and continuous learning opportunities.
  • A collaborative, inclusive culture rooted in respect, diversity, and sustainability.


Vacancy Description

In this dynamic role, you‚Äôll collaborate closely with teams across Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain, and Finance, using your expertise to transform complex datasets into clear, decision-driving insights.

You will:

  • Collect, clean, and analyze data from multiple sources to identify trends and opportunities.
  • Build intuitive dashboards and visualizations using tools like Power BI or Tableau.
  • Design and maintain data models that support strategic planning and operational excellence.
  • Provide actionable recommendations that guide business decisions across the organization.
  • Champion data quality, governance, and standardization across systems and teams.
  • Stay ahead of the curve by identifying new BI tools, trends, and best practices.


Staying true to who you really are, that is your starting point at FrieslandCampina. Because it is precisely by embracing our differences that we can grow together. We want to create a working environment that allows all employees to bring their best and authentic selves. If who we are suits you, but you're not sure if you're the best fit for the role, we still encourage you to apply so we can help you find the role that fits you best.

Team Details

Why FrieslandCampina?

FrieslandCampina is a unique employer ‚Äî our farmer-owned cooperative model empowers us to prioritize people, planet, and profit equally. We foster a culture of equality and inclusion, where every voice matters and every individual can thrive. We are constantly evolving, embracing innovation, and working toward a sustainable future ‚Äî together.

Title: DATA ANALYST
Description:
Bracco is an international Group active in the healthcare sector and a leader in diagnostic imaging. The Group‚Äôs main products are contrast agents sold in over 100 countries, both directly and indirectly through branches, joint ventures and license and distribution agreements.

Are you passionate about leveraging data to drive innovation and impact?

We are looking for a Data Analyst based in Milan. In this role, you'll contribute in shaping data-driven strategies and optimizing operations across our organization.




What is the main purpose of this job?

As Data Analyst, you will join the Transformation & Performance Improvement team.

You'll oversee the development and implementation of data analytics strategies to align with organizational goals. Your expertise in data analysis and visualization will support decision-making processes and continuous improvement initiatives.

You'll be responsible for ensuring data accuracy, identifying trends, and optimizing efficiency through insightful data analysis.




Responsibilities

Develop and implement data analytics strategies aligned with organizational goals.
Utilize advanced data analytics tools such as Power BI to create insightful dashboards for effective visualization.
Define key metrics and KPIs to measure business performance and support decision-making processes.
Conduct in-depth analysis of raw data to identify trends, patterns, and outliers.
Collaborate closely with internal teams to enhance data-driven decision-making capabilities.
Provide support to production sites in Italy by understanding their data needs and offering data analysis expertise.
Communicate complex analytical findings to both technical and non-technical stakeholders effectively.




Travel

Willingness to travel primarily within Italy to provide on-site support to production sites.




Your Profile

Degree in Management Engineering, Statistics, or related field.
Proven experience as Data Analyst with a focus on Power BI usage.
Strong proficiency in Python for data cleaning, data visualization and analysis.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Minimum 3-5 years of work experience, preferably in industrial sectors.
Experience in pharma, chemical or food industry is considered a plus.
Knowledge of Continuous Improvement and Operational Excellence principles is considered a plus.
Fluent English and Italian.




If you meet the requirements of this opportunity and would like to join an international group working to improve patients' lives, apply now!

At Bracco, we believe in the values of diversity and inclusion. We respect and celebrate the diversity of our people and their experiences, ensuring a fair opportunity for all.

We are #Bracco #JoinUs

Ti occuperai della progettazione e gestione di pipeline dati, sviluppo di report e dashboard (Tableau/Power BI), monitoraggio dei sistemi (Grafana) e collaborazione con team cross-funzionali, utilizzando strumenti di versionamento del codice (es. Git) e interfacciandoti con gli stakeholder per la raccolta dei requisiti.




Requisiti

Esperienza consolidata in ruoli di Data Analyst o Data Scientist
Ottima conoscenza di strumenti di BI: Tableau e/o Power BI
Esperienza con tool di monitoring come Grafana
Esperienza nella raccolta e analisi dei requisiti funzionali
Inglese fluente (parlato e scritto)

Per contribuire al tuo sviluppo professionale avrai la possibilit√† di seguire corsi di formazione e di ottenere certificazioni relative al tuo settore.




Iter di selezione:

primo step conoscitivo con HR;
uno o due colloqui con i referenti tecnici del team.

Title: Internship - Data Science
Description:
At ION

We want to innovate the financial services offered by commercial/retail banks in Italy in the areas of wealth management, credit lending, risk management and compliance. Building on our consolidated expertise and product offering in the Capital Markets domain, we want to scale our solutions and frameworks to the commercial/retail banking industry. To do so, we start from the quantitative modelling and analysis of the current processes put in place by our customers, so that we can profile opportunities of automation and prioritize client needs on manual/painful workflows. The resource will be involved in business process analyses of Italian commercial/retail financial institutions and is expected to integrate structured information extracted from interviews with the analysis of literature and documentation to build a quantitative picture of the AS-IS. The analysis will then be complemented with a consequent implementation analysis and product roadmap definition to design the TO-BE and drive product evolutions and developments. The project entails modelling complex business contexts, extracting structured information from unstructured sources, performing quantitative analyses, presenting findings and recommendations to external clients and internal stakeholders, contributing to the definition of product backlogs.

What You Will Learn During Your Intern


Quantitative modelling of business processes
Codification of customer requirements, needs, activities
Business intelligence with PowerBI/Excel - Packaging high-quality deliverables for external clients ‚Äì
Data manipulation with Pandas or Spark/Hive


What You Need To Know


Hands-on experience with BI tools (Excel, PowerBI)
Experience with Python data science libraries (pandas, pyspark, sklearn) is nice to have
Fluent English


We Are Looking For Someone Who


is passionate about modelling unknown business contexts with a quantitative approach
can find a good trade-off between quality and speed of delivery
proactively contribute your insights and ideas in a way that fits existing frameworks of the firm
is fond of sharing knowledge with colleagues and documenting your work
Show more

Title: Junior Analyst
HTML:
Chi siamo

Supermoney √® il marketplace digitale leader in Italia nel settore Utilities (Luce-Gas, Telco). Ha registrato una crescita dei ricavi x5 tra il 2019 ed il 2023. Ha sviluppato tecnologia proprietaria (basata su algoritmi di Artificial Intelligence) protetta da registrazione.


Chi cerchiamo

Per supportare i progetti della funzione di Business Intelligence, siamo alla ricerca di una persona con una forte passione per il digital e per i progetti innovativi, da inserire nel dipartimento in qualit√† di Junior Analyst, in stage.


La/Il candidata/o ideale, prima ancora di avere competenze specifiche, ha una spiccata attitudine imprenditoriale: curiosit√† per individuare e definire i perimetri di progetti ed analisi, proattivit√† e concretezza per farli avanzare e desiderio di approfondire le tematiche trattate.


Cosa offriamo

  • Contratto di stage retribuito di 1.200,00 euro netti al mese per 6 mesi, finalizzato all‚Äôassunzione in azienda;
  • Crescita professionale ed economica;
  • Occasione di fare la differenza, contribuendo con i propri input e punti di vista;
  • Ambiente di lavoro giovane, informale e dinamico.


Attivit√† principali

  • Assistere nell'analisi e nel monitoraggio dei KPI economici e operativi a supporto delle decisioni aziendali;
  • Supportare la comprensione dei fenomeni attraverso analisi complesse che producono insight azionabili per migliorare le performance dell‚Äôazienda;
  • Creare visualizzazioni e dashboard automatizzate, anche attraverso tool come Power BI, per monitorare in tempo reale le performance di tutte le business unit;
  • Contribuire all'identificazione di aree critiche e spazi di miglioramento e proporre azioni concrete per indirizzarle;
  • Fornire supporto e indicazioni ai team di Operations e Marketing, sulla base di analisi ed evidenze quantitative;
  • Garantire il funzionamento e la correttezza della reportistica e dei processi del dato attraverso estrazioni ed elaborazioni sui database, utilizzando codice SQL.


Requisiti

  • Laurea Magistrale in discipline scientifiche: Ingegneria, Matematica, Statistica, Fisica, Economia o altra disciplina quantitativa;
  • Approccio fortemente analitico e capacit√† di problem solving;
  • Ottime doti di comunicazione orale e scritta (anche in inglese);
  • Disponibilit√†, flessibilit√† e concretezza.


Mindset

  • Avere spirito imprenditoriale, propositivo ed innovativo;
  • Portare a compimento i progetti prima del tempo previsto;
  • Pi√π veloce √®, pi√π semplice √®, meglio √®;
  • Non concentrarsi sui problemi; ma sulle soluzioni;
  • Andare oltre le mansioni assegnate pur mostrandosi curiosi verso nuove attivit√†;
  • Imparare velocemente.


Sede di lavoro

Milano (1 giorno alla settimana di smart-working).

Title: Coverage & Data Analysis Engineer
Description:
CHI SIAMO

Il 31 Dicembre 2024 Swisscom, per il tramite della propria controllata Fastweb, ha finalizzato l'acquisizione di Vodafone Italia in vista di una integrazione delle due aziende.

Fastweb e Vodafone Italia da oggi lavoreranno insieme per creare un operatore convergente leader del mercato mettendo il meglio delle rispettive reti fisse e mobili e delle proprie competenze e capacit√† per offrire alle famiglie, alle aziende e al Paese servizi innovativi e a prezzi competitivi per continuare a promuovere la trasformazione in chiave digitale dell‚ÄôItalia.

Cosa troverai in Fastweb + Vodafone?

WE FEEL CLOSE #belonging

Insieme lavoriamo ogni giorno per creare un ambiente di lavoro informale e accogliente, in cui ogni persona possa portare il proprio contributo. Mostriamo apertura e curiosit√† nello sperimentare nuove soluzioni per noi e per i nostri clienti in un clima orientato alla collaborazione e al rispetto.

WE ARE SMART #flexibility

Smart working, autonomia nella gestione delle attivit√† e lavoro per obiettivi. Mettiamo le relazioni e i risultati al centro e promuoviamo una cultura di empowerment e collaborazione puntando su fiducia e responsabilit√†.

WE LEARN #impact

In Fastweb + Vodafone possiamo coltivare il nostro talento. Ciascuna persona √® alla guida del proprio sviluppo grazie a programmi innovativi e a percorsi professionalizzanti per costruire la propria crescita.

WE FEEL GOOD #wellbeing

In Fastweb + Vodafone le persone sono la nostra priorit√†. C‚Äô√® una grande attenzione al benessere fisico e psicologico e al mantenimento di un sano work life balance, oltre alla disponibilit√† di tanti servizi utili, gratuiti e innovativi per semplificare la quotidianit√† e coltivare passioni e interessi.

WE ARE UNIQUE #inclusion

In Fastweb + Vodafone l‚Äôinclusione √® una scelta, che rende l‚Äôambiente positivo, dinamico e ricco di stimoli. Facciamo tesoro delle differenze perch√© caratterizzano noi, la nostra clientela e il mondo che ci circonda: dall‚Äôincontro delle nostre unicit√† nascono creativit√†, innovazione e crescita continua.

WE ARE SUSTAINABLE #sustainability

In Fastweb + Vodafone l‚Äôattenzione verso un futuro pi√π sostenibile √® un impegno quotidiano.

Contribuiamo in modo concreto e misurabile al raggiungimento degli obiettivi globali, al benessere del pianeta e della societ√†. Integriamo la sostenibilit√† nelle nostre attivit√† di business, utilizzando energia elettrica proveniente al 100% da fonti rinnovabili e abilitando attraverso le nostre tecnologie la trasformazione ecologica e il superamento del digital divide.

WE CARE #customer

La nostra missione √® conquistare nel quotidiano la fiducia e la credibilit√† dei nostri clienti, garantendo esperienze di valore. Il nostro impegno consiste nel realizzare servizi sempre migliori, con l'obiettivo di offrire ai clienti soluzioni che rispondano alle loro esigenze e contribuiscano a costruire un futuro migliore.

CHI STIAMO CERCANDO ?

In Fastweb+Vodafone stiamo cercando un profilo di Coverage & Data Analysis Engineer per il Team Technology.

Il tuo obiettivo √® fornire analisi e proposte volte a garantire la migliore copertura tecnologica possibile, l'ottimizzazione delle risorse tecnologiche, l'efficienza degli investimenti necessari. Supporterai la valutazione e lo sviluppo di progetti strategici aziendali e di business (B2C,B2B, Wholesale).

In un ambiente dinamico puoi metterti alla prova e incrementare le tue competenze tecniche, collaborare con diversi team aziendali e contribuire direttamente alla crescita e all'innovazione dell'azienda.

DESCRIZIONE DEL RUOLO

In qualit√† di Coverage & Data Analysis Engineer nel Team Technology le tue attivit√† e responsabilit√† saranno le seguenti:


Analizzare la disponibilit√† delle diverse tecnologie di accesso sul territorio nazionale
Pianificare e gestire le risorse della rete di accesso in relazione alla copertura e al budget per progetti a medio e lungo termine
Supportare e proporre progetti strategici di deployment di rete in accordo con i vari dipartimenti aziendali
Fornire analisi e viste a supporto dei piani di capacity e decommissioning di rete
Creare reportistiche e dashboard relative a copertura, pianificazione ampliamenti e aperture di rete
Supportare la messa in campo dei servizi di copertura sui tool di produzione


REQUISITI ESSENZIALI


Laurea in discipline STEM preferibilmente ingegneria TLC, gestionale, informatica
Esperienza in ambito Data Analisys e Telecomunicazioni
Conoscenza di tool di data visualization (es. Tableau e/o Power Bi e/o Qlik Sense)
Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto office (Power Point, Excel)
Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese
Eccellenti capacit√† analitiche e di sintesi
Forte orientamento al risultato
Proattivit√† e autonomia


ALTRE INFORMAZIONI

SEDE DI LAVORO E INQUADRAMENTO

Milano modalit√† ibrida

Full Time

Tempo Indeterminato

Siamo un luogo di lavoro inclusivo ed attento a garantire pari opportunit√† senza distinzione di genere, identit√† di genere, orientamento sessuale, etnia, et√†, religione e disabilit√†.

Il nostro impegno consiste nel realizzare servizi sempre migliori, con l'obiettivo di offrire ai clienti soluzioni che rispondano alle loro esigenze e contribuiscano a costruire un futuro migliore.

CHI STIAMO CERCANDO ?

In Fastweb+Vodafone stiamo cercando un profilo di Coverage & Data Analysis Engineer per il Team Technology.

Il tuo obiettivo √® fornire analisi e proposte volte a garantire la migliore copertura tecnologica possibile, l'ottimizzazione delle risorse tecnologiche, l'efficienza degli investimenti necessari. Supporterai la valutazione e lo sviluppo di progetti strategici aziendali e di business (B2C,B2B, Wholesale).

In un ambiente dinamico puoi metterti alla prova e incrementare le tue competenze tecniche, collaborare con diversi team aziendali e contribuire direttamente alla crescita e all'innovazione dell'azienda.

DESCRIZIONE DEL RUOLO

In qualit√† di Coverage & Data Analysis Engineer nel Team Technology le tue attivit√† e responsabilit√† saranno le seguenti:

  • Analizzare la disponibilit√† delle diverse tecnologie di accesso sul territorio nazionale
  • Pianificare e gestire le risorse della rete di accesso in relazione alla copertura e al budget per progetti a medio e lungo termine
  • Supportare e proporre progetti strategici di deployment di rete in accordo con i vari dipartimenti aziendali
  • Fornire analisi e viste a supporto dei piani di capacity e decommissioning di rete
  • Creare reportistiche e dashboard relative a copertura, pianificazione ampliamenti e aperture di rete
  • Supportare la messa in campo dei servizi di copertura sui tool di produzione

REQUISITI ESSENZIALI

  • Laurea in discipline STEM preferibilmente ingegneria TLC, gestionale, informatica
  • Esperienza in ambito Data Analisys e Telecomunicazioni
  • Conoscenza di tool di data visualization (es. Tableau e/o Power Bi e/o Qlik Sense)
  • Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto office (Power Point, Excel)
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese
  • Eccellenti capacit√† analitiche e di sintesi
  • Forte orientamento al risultato
  • Proattivit√† e autonomia

ALTRE INFORMAZIONI

SEDE DI LAVORO E INQUADRAMENTO

Milano modalit√† ibrida

Full Time

Tempo Indeterminato

Siamo un luogo di lavoro inclusivo ed attento a garantire pari opportunit√† senza distinzione di genere, identit√† di genere, orientamento sessuale, etnia, et√†, religione e disabilit√†.

Title: Business Data Analyst - Pharmaceutical Company
HTML:
Chaberton Professionals, divisione di Chaberton Partners dedicata alla ricerca e selezione di profili di Middle Management, √® attualmente alla ricerca di un/una Business Data Analyst per conto di un‚Äôimportante realt√† farmaceutica.


OBIETTIVO

La risorsa, in qualit√† di partner affidabile per il business, fornisce supporto alle diverse funzioni della BU Pharma (NSM, Channel Manager, Marketing e Area Manager regionali). Collabora con i responsabili di area in tutte le fasi gestionali della forza vendita (disegno della rete, allocazione delle risorse, definizione dei territori, obiettivi di vendita e piani visite, valutazione e monitoraggio delle performance), offrendo analisi puntuali e di valore, indicatori affidabili e dati precisi.


RESPONSABILITA‚Äô

  • Progettazione e implementazione degli schemi incentivanti e calcolo dei relativi premi, in collaborazione con il responsabile di BU;
  • Gestione e aggiornamento del CRM aziendale (Salesforce);
  • Coordinamento dell‚Äôimplementazione di nuovi processi e miglioramenti nel CRM, anche in sinergia con il team centrale, con l‚Äôobiettivo di aumentare efficienza ed efficacia della forza vendita;
  • Supporto continuo alla rete sul corretto utilizzo del CRM e sviluppo di metodologie per ottimizzare l‚Äôallocazione delle risorse;
  • Analisi di mercato, paesi, aziende, prodotti e competitor;
  • Supporto nella revisione e ottimizzazione della copertura territoriale della forza vendita.


REQUISITI

  • Laurea in discipline economiche o scientifiche;
  • Almeno 2/3 anni di esperienza nel ruolo
  • Eccellenti capacit√† analitiche, ottime doti organizzative e di pianificazione;
  • Ottima padronanza del pacchetto Office (in particolare PowerPoint ed Excel);
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese;
  • Attitudine al lavoro in team.

Title: Linguistics Data Analyst - Remote - Milan, Italy
Description:
We‚Äôre looking for a driven, multilingual professional who thrives in fast-paced environments and is excited to contribute to a collaborative, multicultural team.

As a Data Analyst on our Linguistics team, you‚Äôll leverage your language expertise to support the development and refinement of language data across our products. Your fluency will directly impact how specific languages are represented and maintained within Lightcast‚Äôs global platform. In this role, you‚Äôll play a pivotal part in shaping linguistic features, driving quality standards, and enhancing product functionality.

This is a full-time contract role with the potential to transition into a W-2 employee position based on performance and business needs. It‚Äôs a unique opportunity to influence the evolution of language data on a global scale while contributing to cutting-edge technology.

Major Responsibilities:


Analyze and enhance the data quality of multilingual text classifiers
Collaborate with linguistics and engineering teams to develop and optimize language parsers
Translate and align taxonomies across multiple languages, including Skills, Titles, and Occupations
Create crosswalks from source language skills and job titles to Lightcast‚Äôs standardized taxonomies
Utilize SQL for efficient data handling, querying, and database management


Education and Experience:


Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Linguistics, Data Analytics, NLP, or a related field (preferred)
Strong linguistics knowledge, including syntax and structural analysis of languages
Competency in three or more languages ‚Äî strong preference given to candidates fluent in Danish, Croatian, and Czech
Knowledge of multinational labor markets (preferred)
Experience with data analysis using tools such as Excel or Python
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including vlookups, data cleanup, and functions
Knowledge of query languages such as SQL
Familiarity with text analysis or machine learning principles
Knowledge of RegEx


Lightcast is a global leader in labor market insights with headquarters in Moscow (ID) with offices in the United Kingdom, Europe, and India. We work with partners across six continents to help drive economic prosperity and mobility by providing the insights needed to build and develop our people, our institutions and companies, and our communities.

Lightcast is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. Lightcast has always been, and always will be, committed to diversity, equity and inclusion. We seek dynamic professionals from all backgrounds to join our teams, and we encourage our employees to bring their authentic, original, and best selves to work.

Title: Junior Consultant Data Engineer (Intern)
HTML:
We let the future guide us. Join our next generation

Vuoi fare un lavoro che sia davvero significativo e di impatto? In KPMG avrai l‚Äôopportunit√† di aiutare i clienti, la societ√†, le colleghe e i colleghi ad affrontare e risolvere le sfide pi√π attuali e complesse. KPMG Advisory offre servizi di consulenza alle imprese per affiancarle nella trasformazione del business model, nel miglioramento e nella digitalizzazione dei processi, nell'analisi e nella gestione dei rischi, nonch√© supporto nelle operazioni di finanza straordinaria.

Nel particolare, entrerai a far parte del Team di Lighthouse.

La Lighthouse √® il centro di eccellenza di KPMG Advisory che offre soluzioni di Data & Analytics sul mercato.

Unendoti al team, svilupperai soluzioni innovative attingendo dalle nostre competenze globali. Combinerai informatica, matematica, statistica e business per creare analisi predittive, presentandole e comunicandole con professionalit√† e competenza. Opererai in un ambiente orientato all'innovazione tecnologica, occupandoti dell'ingegneria dei dati, con un forte focus sulla progettazione delle informazioni e visualizzazione dei dati. Abbiamo ricevuto riconoscimenti internazionali per quanto riguarda la nostra capacit√† di interpretare e gestire i dati.

Nello specifico, ti occuperai di:

  • Analisi di modelli analitici a supporto dei processi di business;
  • Analisi, progettazione e implementazione di fonti di dati;
  • Data Visualization, Advanced Analytics, Big Data;
  • Progettare KPI e i framework di calcolo pi√π efficienti;
  • Analizzare, progettare e implementare modelli di reporting e dashboard di monitoraggio;
  • Analizzare processi aziendali e progettare modelli di supporto analitico;
  • Implementare soluzioni analitiche, supportare il go-live e gestire la manutenzione delle applicazioni.

Come As You Are - Le tue competenze e caratteristiche

Questa opportunit√† √® perfetta per te se:

  • Possiedi una Laurea in economia, matematica, ingegneria matematica, statistica, ingegneria informatica, ingegneria gestionale o informatica;
  • Hai sviluppato conoscenza in ambito dati e database (modelli dati entit√†/relazioni, DBMS)
  • Hai sviluppato la capacit√† di combinare competenze aziendali con competenze IT, inclusa la modellazione dei dati;
  • Hai sviluppato interesse per la Data Visualization e Business Intelligence
  • Hai sviluppato Interesse per i tool ed i processi ETL (Informatica, Talend, Datastage);
  • Hai una buona padronanza della lingua inglese, preferibilmente con esperienze di studio e/o lavoro all'estero;
  • Possiedi conoscenza di almeno uno dei seguenti database (Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL) e hai sviluppato competenze in SQL; la conoscenza di linguaggi di programmazione rappresenta un vantaggio.

Your Future With Us - Cosa troverai in KPMG

  • Un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, equo e che rispetta, incoraggia e valorizza le diversit√†;
  • Un contesto stimolante e dinamico che incentiva la creativit√† e il lavoro di squadra;
  • Modalit√† di lavoro ibrida, per promuovere un sano equilibrio tra vita lavorativa e personale;
  • Programmi di formazione e sviluppo avanzati per rimanere sempre aggiornati;
  • Mindset internazionale e progettualit√† innovative;
  • Iniziative incentrate sul benessere psicofisico.

Together for Better ‚Äì I nostri valori e il nostro impegno

Leadership, lavoro in team, rispetto di ogni individualit√†, approfondimento continuo, trasparenza, impegno verso la comunit√†, integrit√†: questi sono i Valori di KPMG che danno vita a un ambiente aperto allo scambio di idee e di conoscenza, che permette ai nostri professionisti di esprimere tutto il loro potenziale.

Grazie all‚Äôimpegno nel favorire un ambiente di lavoro inclusivo, il nostro Network ha ottenuto le certificazioni ISO 30415, che attesta la conformit√† del Sistema di Gestione per la Diversit√† e l‚ÄôInclusione, e UNI PdR 125, che certifica la parit√† di genere. All‚Äôinterno del nostro Impact Plan - Our Impact Plan (kpmg.com) - trovi riassunte tutte le azioni concrete che stiamo portando avanti su tematiche ambientali, sociali e di governance (ESG).

Unisciti a noi!

I tuoi dati saranno trattati nel pieno rispetto delle disposizioni del Regolamento (UE) n. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation - "GDPR") e successive modifiche. Per ulteriori informazioni, consultare l'informativa sulla privacy di KPMG.

KPMG Advisory S.p.A. garantisce le pari opportunit√†

At KPMG - no secrets with big data

We let the future guide us. Join our next generation

Do you want to pursue a profession that is truly meaningful and impactful? At KPMG, you will have the opportunity to help clients, the company and colleagues address and solve the most current and complex challenges. KPMG Advisory offers consulting services to companies to assist them in business model transformation, process improvement and digitisation, risk analysis and management, and support in extraordinary finance transactions.

Specifically, you will join our Lighthouse team.

Lighthouse is the KPMG Advisory centre of excellence delivering an array of data & analytics solutions.

Alongside the team, you will develop innovative solutions by drawing on our global expertise,with access to shared knowledge from our centres of excellence Your experience in IT, mathematics and statistics along with your corporate expertise will allow you to design and implement predictive analytical solutions, integrating different factors and presenting them in a professional manner. In a business- and technological innovation-orientated environment, your work will embrace data science, data engineering and information visualisation.

Specifically, you will be tasked with:

  • designing databases for analytical purposes;
  • analysing and integrating data sources;
  • data visualization , advanced analytics, Big Data;
  • designing more efficient KPIs and computing frameworks;
  • analysing, designing and implementing reporting models and dashboards;
  • analysing corporate processes and designing analytical support models;
  • implementing analytical solutions, supporting the launch and overseeing the maintenance of software.

Skills

 Come As You Are - Your skills and characteristics

This is the perfect opportunity for you if:

  • you have a degree in economics, mathematics, mathematical engineering, statistics, computer engineering, management and production engineering or computer science;
  • you have developed the capacity to combine corporate and IT expertise, as well as data modelling;
  • you have developed aninterest in Data Visualization/Business Intelligence;
  • you are proficient in English, preferably with study/work experience abroad
  • you have knowledge of at least one of the following databases (Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL) and have developed skills in SQL; knowledge of programming languages is considered an advantage.

Your Future With Us - What you‚Äôll find at KPMG

  • An inclusive and equitable work environment that respects, encourages and values diversity.
  • A challenging and dynamic environment that encourages creativity and teamwork.
  • Hybrid work arrangements to promote a healthy work-life balance.
  • Advanced training and development programmes to stay current.
  • International mindset and innovative projects.
  • Initiatives focused on mental and physical well-being.

Together for Better ‚Äì Our values and commitment

Leadership, teamwork, respect every individual, continuous learning, transparency, commitment to the community and integrity. These are the KPMG values that create an environment that encourages the sharing of ideas and knowledge, so our professionals can achieve their full potential.

As a result of our commitment to fostering an inclusive work environment, our Network has obtained ISO 30415 certification, which certifies compliance of the Diversity and Inclusion Management System, and UNI PdR 125, which certifies gender equality. Within our Impact Plan - Our Impact Plan (kpmg.com) - you will find summarised all the concrete actions we are taking on environmental, social and governance (ESG) issues.

Join us!

Your data will be processed in full compliance with the provisions of Regulation (EU) no. 679/2016 (General Data Protection Regulation - ‚ÄúGDPR‚Äù), as amended. For more information, please see KPMG‚Äôs privacy policy.

KPMG Advisory S.p.A. is an equal opportunity employer.

Definire e mettere a terra la strategia di personalizzazione end-to-end dell‚Äôesperienza degli utenti in un‚Äôottica Data-Driven, inclusa la componente di manipolazione e integrazione front-end (JavaScript da base ad avanzato, jQuery, CSS / HTML, servizi Web / API)

Conoscenza approfondita di Adobe Analytics (inclusa creazione di reports e segmenti), Adobe Target e Google Analytics

Esperienza pertinente ad Adobe Target di 3/4 anni, una conoscenza approfondita dell'architettura del sito Web / App mobile dei clienti, del modello di business digitale e delle strategie di marketing digitale

Laurea in ambito economico/matematico o informatico

Certificazione Adobe Target

Title: Business Intelligence Analyst
HTML:
Cosa Ti Proponiamo

All‚Äôinterno della divisione Eng Digital, siamo alla ricerca di una figura di Business Intelligence Analyst. Sarai inserito/a all'interno di Atlantic Technologies, societ√† del gruppo Engineering, leader internazionale nella consulenza Salesforce e nell'offerta di soluzioni all'avanguardia in ambito ERP e Business Intelligence.

Quali saranno le tue attivit√† e responsabilit√†?

  • Attivit√† di raccolta dei requisiti di business e disegno della Data Strategy;
  • Coinvolgimento nelle fasi di design, sviluppo e test al fine di implementare soluzioni di Analytics, AI & ML;
  • Coinvolgimento in attivit√† di rollout sulle sedi internazionali dei nostri clienti;
  • Lavorerai a diretto contatto con le unit√† Business e IT del cliente.

Qualifiche e Competenze Richieste

  • Esperienza di almeno 2 anni nell'analisi dei processi aziendali;
  • Capacit√† di svolgere sessioni di analisi, raccolta requisiti e identificazione delle migliori soluzioni per il cliente;
  • Competenze di Sviluppo e Configurazione DataLake, Datawarehouse, Database;
  • Esperienza in contesti B2B preferibilmente settore manifatturiero con conoscenza approfondita dei relativi processi di Vendita e/o Produzione;
  • Ottime capacit√† comunicative, flessibilit√† e capacit√† di lavorare per obiettivi;
  • Ottima conoscenza della lingua inglese (B2/C1);
  • Ottima conoscenza del pacchetto Office.

Cosa cerchiamo nelle nostre persone?

  • Ambizione, nel perseguire grandi obiettivi e nell'investire sul miglioramento continuo;
  • Proattivit√†, nell‚Äôanticipare e affrontare le sfide con iniziativa;
  • Trasparenza, nel comunicare apertamente e fornire feedback costruttivi;
  • Motivazione a migliorare e a crescere insieme agli altri, manifestando apertura al confronto per favorire la crescita collettiva e il raggiungimento degli obiettivi comuni.

Title: Data Science Intern
Description:
Job description:



JOB PURPOSE

¬†

Prada Group is seeking a driven and passionate Data Science Intern to join our Data Analytics team within the IT department. This is an exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience with real-world datasets and advanced technologies in a dynamic, international luxury fashion environment. As a Data Science Intern, you will play a key role in enhancing our personalization capabilities and optimizing marketing campaigns that impact how we connect with our customers globally.¬†

¬†

¬†

RESPONSIBILITIES

¬†

Design, implement, and refine machine learning models to optimize both one-to-one and one-to-many marketing communication strategies.
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand business objectives and translate them into technical solutions.
Manage and analyze large datasets using cloud platforms such as Databricks.
Develop test, and deploy scalable machine learning algorithms using Python and PySpark.¬†
Contribute to ongoing improvement of data processes, methodologies, and best practices within the team.

¬†

¬†

KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS¬†

¬†

Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.

Proficiency in Python and familiarity with PySpark.

Exposure to cloud-based analytics environments - experience with Databricks or similar platform is a plus.

Experience using data visualization tools such as Power BI is advantageous.

Analytical and problem-solving skills, with a detail-oriented approach.

Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment.

Willingness to learn, adapt, and grow within a fast-paced, innovative setting.

Organized, with strong time management skills and the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously.

Show more
HTML:
Job description:

JOB PURPOSE

 

Prada Group is seeking a driven and passionate Data Science Intern to join our Data Analytics team within the IT department. This is an exciting opportunity to gain hands-on experience with real-world datasets and advanced technologies in a dynamic, international luxury fashion environment. As a Data Science Intern, you will play a key role in enhancing our personalization capabilities and optimizing marketing campaigns that impact how we connect with our customers globally. 

 

 

RESPONSIBILITIES

 

  • Design, implement, and refine machine learning models to optimize both one-to-one and one-to-many marketing communication strategies.
  • Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to understand business objectives and translate them into technical solutions.
  • Manage and analyze large datasets using cloud platforms such as Databricks.
  • Develop test, and deploy scalable machine learning algorithms using Python and PySpark. 
  • Contribute to ongoing improvement of data processes, methodologies, and best practices within the team.

 

 

KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS 

 

Currently pursuing or recently completed a degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.

Proficiency in Python and familiarity with PySpark.

Exposure to cloud-based analytics environments - experience with Databricks or similar platform is a plus.

Experience using data visualization tools such as Power BI is advantageous.

Analytical and problem-solving skills, with a detail-oriented approach.

Ability to collaborate effectively in a team environment.

Willingness to learn, adapt, and grow within a fast-paced, innovative setting.

Organized, with strong time management skills and the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously.

Title: Junior Digital Analyst - Milan
Description:
A proposito di fifty-five:¬†

fifty-five √® una data-company di un nuovo genere che aiuta i brand a sfruttare i dati per migliorare il marketing, i media e l'esperienza del cliente grazie a una combinazione di servizi di consulenza e tecnologia specializzata, pilastro del Brandtech Group nel settore data e marketing, propone un'ampia gamma di servizi che fondono consulenza strategica, services cloud, expertise media e miglioramento della customer experience.


fifty-five conta pi√π di 400 esperti digitali. Consulenti digitali, specialisti di tracking e media, ingegneri e data scientist lavorano in sinergia per fornire consulenze di marketing di alto livello e assistenza tecnica ai brand in tutti i settori, in tutto il mondo.


Come partner fidato degli inserzionisti nella gestione dei dati per la loro raccolta, attivazione e valorizzazione,¬† supportiamo le organizzazioni nel divenire realt√† omnicanale efficaci attraverso la gestione dell'ecosistema digitale e l'integrazione con il mondo fisico.


Con sede a Parigi, operiamo su 3 fusi orari dai nostri 10 uffici situati a Parigi, Londra, Ginevra, Milano, Shanghai, Hong Kong, Shenzhen, Taipei, Singapore e New York. Fifty-five attribuisce particolare importanza al benessere dei suoi collaboratori.


Contesto:¬†

Dopo una fase di onboarding approfondito nel nostro ufficio di Milano, utilizzerete la vostra expertise delle soluzioni di web analytics e dei tag management systems (TMS) per svolgere varie mansioni per i nostri clienti.


Mansioni:¬†

In qualit√† di Junior Digital Analyst, farete leva sulla vostra padronanza tecnica delle soluzioni di web analytics e dei tag manager (TMS) per svolgere varie mansioni per i nostri clienti.


Il vostro ruolo sar√† di:¬†

Implementazione tecnica delle soluzioni tracking dei siti web/mobile o app del cliente, dalla raccolta delle esigenze alla raccolta effettiva dei dati di cui garantirete qualit√† e affidabilit√†;¬†
Gestire i progetti a contatto con il cliente (garantendo l'avanzamento delle missioni, pianificazione, strategia di test, consegne) sulle problematiche di raccolta dati Analytics e Media;¬†
Condividere le vostre conoscenze e competenze con i clienti e internamente;¬†
Mantenere un collegamento permanente con i diversi attori lato cliente/integratore;
Sviluppare un know-how operativo dettagliato (TMS & Analytics);¬†
Sviluppare nuove opportunit√† di business in collaborazione con i consulenti responsabili del conto;¬†
Partecipare alla definizione dei prodotti e degli strumenti interni dell'azienda;¬†
Partecipare alla concezione e al posizionamento dell'offerta tecnologica di fifty-five.




Profilo ricercato:¬†

Laureato/a in discipline STEM o economia , con 1 o 2 anni di esperienza nella gestione di progetti di Tracking / Misurazione / Web Analytics.


Competenze:¬†

Esperienza nella gestione progetti interfacciandosi con team digitali ed IT;
Conoscenza dei principali strumenti di web analytics¬† (Adobe Analytics, Google Analytics, AT Internet...); Tag Management System (GTM, Launch, Tealium, Commanders Act, ...)
Conoscenze di JavaScript (comprensione e sviluppo di logiche semplici) e Web in generale;¬†
Forte spirito analitico;¬†
Eccellente comunicazione orale e scritta;¬†
Grande passione per le tecnologie e il settore di internet;¬†
Competenze in ambiente mobile sono un plus;¬†
Conoscenze del funzionamento dei CMP sono un plus;¬†
Buona capacit√† di proporre soluzioni perfettamente in linea con le esigenze;¬†
Buon livello sia di italiano che di inglese.



I vantaggi di lavorare in fifty-five:¬†

Politica di smart working;
Particolare attenzione all'equilibrio vita privata / vita professionale nel rispetto del diritto alla disconnessione;¬†
Un ambiente multiculturale con collaboratori di oltre 20 nazionalit√† diverse;¬†
Valori interni incentrati sull'eccellenza, la benevolenza e la condivisione;
Formazione continua (e riconosciuta) sull'ecosistema, le tecnologie digitali e sulle soft skills (es: public speaking, gestione del team ecc.);
Possibilit√† di partecipare a progetti interni come Data Hive (un progetto "tech for good" promosso dai dipendenti di fifty-five, il cui scopo √® mettere le loro conoscenze e competenze a disposizione di organizzazioni benefiche), DEI@55 (un gruppo di lavoro sui temi della diversit√† e dell'inclusione all'interno di fifty-five e della tecnologia pi√π in generale), Sustainability@55 (un team che aiuta a implementare pratiche sostenibili internamente e presso i nostri clienti).



In fifty-five, siamo convinti che la diversit√† e l'inclusione siano vere forze. Ci impegniamo a garantire parit√† di trattamento di tutte le candidature ricevute, senza distinzione di genere, et√†, origine, orientamento sessuale, stato di salute o opinione politica o religiosa. Incontra il team di fifty-five!


Localizzazione: Corso Giacomo Matteotti 1, CAP 20121 Milano

Tipo di contratto: Contratto di lavoro a tempo pieno e indeterminato

Salario: in base all'esperienza

Title: Internship - Data Science
Description:
At ION

We want to innovate the financial services offered by commercial/retail banks in Italy in the areas of wealth management, credit lending, risk management and compliance. Building on our consolidated expertise and product offering in the Capital Markets domain, we want to scale our solutions and frameworks to the commercial/retail banking industry. To do so, we start from the quantitative modelling and analysis of the current processes put in place by our customers, so that we can profile opportunities of automation and prioritize client needs on manual/painful workflows. The resource will be involved in business process analyses of Italian commercial/retail financial institutions and is expected to integrate structured information extracted from interviews with the analysis of literature and documentation to build a quantitative picture of the AS-IS. The analysis will then be complemented with a consequent implementation analysis and product roadmap definition to design the TO-BE and drive product evolutions and developments. The project entails modelling complex business contexts, extracting structured information from unstructured sources, performing quantitative analyses, presenting findings and recommendations to external clients and internal stakeholders, contributing to the definition of product backlogs.

What You Will Learn During Your Intern


Quantitative modelling of business processes
Codification of customer requirements, needs, activities
Business intelligence with PowerBI/Excel - Packaging high-quality deliverables for external clients ‚Äì
Data manipulation with Pandas or Spark/Hive


What You Need To Know


Hands-on experience with BI tools (Excel, PowerBI)
Experience with Python data science libraries (pandas, pyspark, sklearn) is nice to have
Fluent English


We Are Looking For Someone Who


is passionate about modelling unknown business contexts with a quantitative approach
can find a good trade-off between quality and speed of delivery
proactively contribute your insights and ideas in a way that fits existing frameworks of the firm
is fond of sharing knowledge with colleagues and documenting your work

Title: Junior - Public Business Transformation

Junior ‚Äì Public Business Transformation Roma/Milano

Stiamo cercando una figura junior da inserire nel team Operation Excellence Public di Deloitte Consulting nelle sedi di Roma e Milano, che lavorer√† in modalit√† Hybrid.

Il business Operation Excellence Public si occupa di supportare i nostri clienti Public nell'individuazioni di soluzioni e modelli finalizzati al miglioramento della produttivit√†, efficienza, qualit√† dei servizi offerti, anche con il supporto delle nuove tecnologie.‚ÄØ

Raccogliere ed analizzare i dati a supporto dell‚Äôelaborazione di soluzioni per i clienti;
Collaborare con il team di progetto in modo proattivo e collaborativo per il raggiungimento dell‚Äôobiettivo comune
Essere costantemente focalizzato sul risultato, sulla responsabilit√† individuale e sulla qualit√† del lavoro

In qualit√† di network globale ci impegniamo per affrontare le principali sfide sociali, economiche e ambientali della societ√† di oggi. WorldImpact √® il nostro programma globale che riunisce tutte le iniziative attraverso cui vogliamo avere un impatto positivo sulle persone, i clienti, l‚Äôambiente e le comunit√† in cui operiamo.

Con Impact for Italy, la declinazione italiana di WorldImpact, Deloitte ha realizzato progetti che ‚Äì in collaborazione con istituzioni, realt√† del terzo settore, universit√† e altri soggetti ‚Äì hanno lasciato un impatto concreto e una legacy per il futuro su tutto il territorio nazionale.

Title: Senior Data Analyst
Description:
About Satispay

Satispay was born to revolutionise everyday payments ‚Äì making them simple, fair, and accessible to everyone. Now, the focus has moved even further, aiming to shape the future of money.

We're a movement empowering millions of people, driven by a shared purpose to tackle big challenges. And we're just getting started. We move quickly, think boldly, and trust each other to challenge the norm, learning and growing as we go.

If you're looking for more than just your next job ‚Äì if you want to build something impactful with a talented team ‚Äì you're in the right place.

What You'll Be Doing

As a Senior Data Analyst, you'll play a key role in enhancing data-driven decision-making and uncovering analytics opportunities for growth within the Growth team and across business lines. Here's what your day-to-day will look like:


Deliver data-driven impact ‚Äì By analyzing and implementing rigorous data-driven solutions that bring concrete value to the Growth team and other business lines, directly influencing strategic decisions and outcomes.
Analyze large datasets ‚Äì To interpret complex information within large datasets, derive actionable insights, and support key decision-making processes across various departments through clear and concise analysis.
Design and manage experiments ‚Äì By developing and overseeing A/B tests and other experiments to optimize product features and business processes, ensuring statistically significant results and providing clear recommendations.
Create data visualizations ‚Äì To track key performance indicators (KPIs) and effectively communicate complex analytical insights to both technical and non-technical stakeholders through intuitive dashboards and comprehensive reports.
Collaborate and integrate data ‚Äì By working closely with cross-functional teams (Product Marketing, CRM, Business Development, Engineering) to embed data insights into broader business strategies, ensuring data informs and shapes key initiatives.


Expect challenges, collaboration, and the freedom to bring your ideas to life. Things change quickly here, so be ready to adapt, take initiative, and shape your role as we grow.

Who We're Looking For

We need a problem-solver who loves teamwork and gets things done. If you're curious and ready for real ownership, you'll fit in! Does this sound like you?


Experience & Analytics ‚Äì 5+ years of experience in Business Intelligence or Data Analytics roles, with a strong foundation in analytical, statistical, and quantitative problem-solving skills applied to real-world business challenges.
Programming Expertise ‚Äì Advanced knowledge of SQL, including query optimization techniques for efficient data manipulation and retrieval from large databases, and extensive knowledge of Python or R for statistical modeling and advanced data analysis.
Visualization Tools ‚Äì Proven experience with data visualization technologies such as Looker and Tableau (or similar tools), with the ability to create compelling and insightful dashboards and reports for diverse audiences.
Communication & Detail ‚Äì Strong attention to detail in data analysis and reporting, coupled with the ability to communicate complex analytical insights effectively and convincingly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Language proficiency ‚Äì Fluency in both Italian and English, enabling seamless communication within our international team and with stakeholders across different locations.


Don't worry if you don't tick every box. We believe in the power of different viewpoints and strengths. Your unique perspective is important as we build something special. If you're passionate and can make a difference, we truly encourage you to apply.

Our Benefits & Perks

We believe high commitment, effort, and impact deserve to be highly rewarded and supported. That‚Äôs why we created Satispay CareAbout, our way of making sure you‚Äôre supported in your well-being, growth, and finances:

üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß CareAbout health & well-being


Unlimited paid time off
Psychological support & mental health webinars with Serenis
Flexible hybrid working system
Extended parental leave
Childcare leave


üìö CareAbout growth & development


Professional development programmes
Internal mobility program
Language classes with Preply
Internal workshops & training


üí∞ CareAbout financial support


Stock Option Plan (with additional grants often provided based on performance)
International relocation support
Competitive salary
Flexible Benefit budget
Meal vouchers


Equal-Opportunity Employer

At Satispay, we're proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and inclusion, welcoming individuals of all backgrounds. This opportunity is open to everyone, regardless - for instance - of race, colour, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, and national origin. Join us in a workplace where everyone belongs!

Learn More About Us

Curious if our way of working clicks with yours? Our values and pillars aren‚Äôt just fancy words on a page - they really shape everything we do. Explore them here.

Sounds like your kind of place? Awesome!

We‚Äôd love to hear your story.

This opportunity is open to everyone, regardless - for instance - of race, colour, religion, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, and national origin. Join us in a workplace where everyone belongs!

Learn More About Us

Curious if our way of working clicks with yours? Our values and pillars aren‚Äôt just fancy words on a page - they really shape everything we do. Explore them here.

Sounds like your kind of place? Awesome!

Title: Financial Data Analyst Trainee
Description:
We are looking for a brilliant and tech-savvy Financial Data Analyst Trainee to join our Milan HQ. The Financial Data Analyst Trainee will support the FP&A team in ensuring accurate financial and operational data management through advanced reporting, dashboarding, and analytics. He/she will contribute to transforming data into actionable insights to support strategic decisions.

Do you match this profile?


Bachelor/Master‚Äôs degree in Business Analytics and Big Data, possibly with Finance and Economics insights
Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel and Power BI; Programing in Python (Pandas, NumPy); experience with ERP systems (SAP) is a strong plus.
Strong analytical and quantitative skills, with a structured and data-driven mindset
Previous experience (or internship) in FP&A, Data Analysis, or similar finance roles with strong exposure to data tools is a strong plus
Ability to manage large datasets and extract business insights through data visualization and storytelling
Proactive, detail-oriented, and eager to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
Fluency in English (spoken and written); Italian is a plus.


If so, apply for this job!

What do we expect from you?


Contribute to the automation and digitalization of FP&A processes, improving efficiency and data accuracy through data modeling, automated reports and dashboard creation
Deliver ad hoc and structured analysis leveraging data science techniques to identify trends, anomalies, and opportunities.


The Recruitment Process


Apply online
If your profile matches our search, you will be contacted by our HR team for a first exploratory interview. Otherwise, you will receive an e-mail to inform you that we will not proceed with your application.
If the first interview turns out to be successful, you‚Äôll meet the Head of FP&A and the Senior Controller
